#summary Explains the setup of pmacct for afrimesh
#labels Phase-Deploy,Phase-Support

  * Download get the pmacct patched version with json output
  * read the install file in the pmacct folder to compile the package
  * after compilation copy the file replace /etc/pmacct/pmacct.conf with the given one using sudo 
  * go into the src folder in the pmacct folder and run ./pmacctd -f /etc/pmacct/pmacct.conf to start pmacct.
  * for further info go to wiki.pmacct.net
